Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Comparing the two event logs Group A Protected Group and Group B Unprotected Group the key difference is that Group B gets a plus 5 boost to the cultural fit score if affiliated with the LocalBusinessLeadersClub while Group A has no such adjustments

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
